OutletGroup.description: The OutletGroup schema contains definitions for an electrical outlet group.
OutletGroup.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent an electrical outlet group for a Redfish implementation.

enumDescriptions.Off: The outlet group is powered off.
enumDescriptions.On: The outlet group is powered on.

title: #OutletGroup.OutletGroup
